H0.text: What colour is the liqueur Galliano. Green

H1.text: What colour is the liqueur Galliano. Amber

H2.text: What colour is the liqueur Galliano. Brown

H3.text: What colour is the liqueur Galliano. Yelow

A4.text: It is a synthetic lemon yellow azo dye.

A5.text: It is the yellow most frequently used such processed food products as corn and potato chips, breakfast cereals such as corn flakes, candies, popcorn, mustard, jams and jellies, gelatin, soft drinks (notably Mountain Dew), energy and sports drinks, and pastries.
